question:
A company wants to ingest customer payment data into the company's data lake in Amazon S3. The company receives payment data every minute on average. The company wants to analyze the payment data in real time. Then the company wants to ingest the data into the data lake.

Which solution will meet these requirements with the MOST operational efficiency?

options.A: Use Amazon Kinesis Data Streams to ingest data. Use AWS Lambda to analyze the data in real time.
options.B: Use AWS Glue to ingest data. Use Amazon Kinesis Data Analytics to analyze the data in real time.
options.C: Use Amazon Kinesis Data Firehose to ingest data. Use Amazon Kinesis Data Analytics to analyze the data in real time.
options.D: Use Amazon API Gateway to ingest data. Use AWS Lambda to analyze the data in real time.

explanation: Kinesis Data Firehose is a fully managed service that can directly deliver streaming data to S3 with minimal operational overhead. Kinesis Data Analytics provides real-time analysis capability. This combination offers the most operationally efficient solution for streaming data ingestion and analysis.
